channel.title: SimpleSAMLphp
channel.description: SimpleSAMLphp** is an award-winning application written in native PHP that deals with authentication. It implements support for multiple protocols, most notably SAML, OpenID or OAuth.

item.title: Hackathon Tiime
item.description: SimpleSAMLphp Hackathon: On 30 January 2024 there will be a hackathon open to all interested in improving SimpleSAMLphp. It will take place in Copenhagen, co-hosted with the TIIME unconference on identity. Please get a side meeting ticket at the TIIME website if you want to participate.
